creator: rcoe@wi.rr.com

text:
There isn't anything that would prevent you from using Commons Net 3.x with Ant 1.8.2 AFAIK.

The tasks are compiled against 1.4 but they are supposed to work with later versions as well.  Ant's distribution doesn't bundle any version of Commons Net, so I don't think this is an issue for Ant.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
rcoe@wi.rr.com
text:
Looks like it was fixed by 
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/NET-444
